page.title: 17Indoor games
page.content: {Monopoly}you can only have six people to play this game because there are only six counters,they are a dog,shoe, boat,car,iron and a hat.You have two dice,you move according to the number on the dice,stopping on different roads,these can be bought.On passing go each player collects Â£200.You can buy property and charge people who stop on your property.There are change and comunity chest cards which can move a player forwards or back,give a prize or a fine or put you in jail.You can also get two cards that can get you out of jail straight away that is only if you have picked up these cards.The winner is the one who has the most money and the most property.
